title: Chrissy Teigen Shows Off Lunaâ€™s News Yeezys â€” a Valentineâ€™s Day Gift from North and Saint West!
text:
The Kardashian clan is known for giving extravagant gifts . Why, just this past Christmas, Kris Jenner gave KhloÃ© Kardashian rare photos of Marilyn Monroe , KhloÃ© gave boyfriend Tristan Thompson a diamond-crusted Patek Philippe watch and a Lorraine Schwartz bracelet â€” and Kylie Jenner gave Thunderbirds to her grandmother, M.J., and her mom . 
But itâ€™s not just the adult Kardashians who get in on the gifting action. The littlest members of the close-knit family are all about it too â€” just ask Chrissy Teigen ! 
On Monday, the 31-year-old Sports Illustrated Swimsuit model showed off a new pair of Yeezys her 10-month-old daughter Luna received from Kim Kardashian West and Kanye West â€˜s kids North , 3, and Saint , 1 â€” in honor of Valentineâ€™s Day. 
The present came with a sweet note addressed to Luna, that read, â€œHappy Valentineâ€™s Day beautiful baby girl! Lots of love, North and Saint.â€ 
â€œOh my gosh, Kim and Kanye â€” my baby is doper than me. My baby is cooler than me!,â€ Teigen gushed as she showed off the black kicks for the camera. 
â€œLook what you got?â€ she told Luna, as the sweet girl grabbed her new footwear. 
Luna appeared happy with her gift, smiling for the camera. But Teigen explained it had been a tough morning for her and husband John Legend â€˜s daughter. â€œMaybe this will help todayâ€™s crankiness,â€ she wrote â€” telling Luna â€œDonâ€™t be sad anymore! Donâ€™t be sad!â€ 
It looked to work, with Luna blowing kisses for the camera (with the help of one of Snapchatâ€™s Valentineâ€™s Day filters). after 3 months of trying to get her to blow kisses, she finally does it for the valentine's snap ğŸ’•ğŸ’•ğŸ’•ğŸ’• ahhhh pic.twitter.com/hR21tOOPfQ

Later on Twitter, Teigen explained that the Kardashians are the tops when it comes to giving presents. 
â€œNOBODY gifts better than this entire family,â€ she told a fan. â€œI swear, @krisjenner goes HAM.â€ @KimKardashian @erynwithnoi NOBODY gifts better than this entire family, I swear. @krisjenner goes HAM

â€œI donâ€™t feel good,â€ she wrote on Twitter . 
In a series of hilarious Snapchats taken late on Sunday night â€“ following the Los Angeles ceremony during which Legend performed â€“ the model appeared to be a little out of it, asking for an assist while attempting to remove her stunning jewelry. 
â€œOkay, Iâ€™m home. Weâ€™re having ramen,â€ she declared in the first video, showing off her silky, orange outfit change. 
By the next update, though, Teigen was laying down. 
â€œIâ€™m on the floor and Johnâ€™s in charge of taking my jewelry off for [ stylist Monica Rose ]. Take it off John,â€ she said. Show Full Article
